title: Process begins to elect new British PM
description: The resignation of Liz Truss after 45 days in office makes her the shortest-serving Prime Minister in UK history. Also: Ukrainians are being told to prepare for blackouts as Russia increases its attacks on energy plants, and a survey says millions of Chinese people over 60 are planning to go back to work.
itunes:subtitle: Candidates need to have the backing of at least 100 MPs
itunes:summary: The resignation of Liz Truss after 45 days in office makes her the shortest-serving Prime Minister in UK history. Also: Ukrainians are being told to prepare for blackouts as Russia increases its attacks on energy plants, and a survey says millions of Chinese people over 60 are planning to go back to work.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
